brand_identity.name: Clarity Labs
brand_identity.tagline: Video production for SaaS & AI brands
brand_identity.aesthetic: Dark Mode, High Contrast, Editorial, Asymmetric

layout_rules.alignment: Left aligned by default. Center only for specific editorial moments.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons (already installed). Use thin stroke (1.5px) for elegance.

Button.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
Button.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg transition-colors
Button.ghost: text-white/70 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

Card.base: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/10 p-8 md:p-12 flex flex-col gap-6 relative overflow-hidden group

components_map.Input: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-white/30 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 h-14 px-6 rounded-none md:rounded-sm

Navbar.style: Fixed, glassmorphism, high z-index. Logo left, Links center (hidden mobile), CTA right.
Navbar.mobile: Hamburger menu opens full screen overlay with massive typography links.

Hero.layout: Split screen or Full background with overlay. Typography must be MASSIVE (text-7xl+).
Hero.content: Headline: 'We turn SaaS into Cinema'. Subhead: 'Premium video production for brands that refuse to be boring.'
Hero.visual: Use 'hero_bg' image with a gradient overlay (black to transparent) to ensure text readability.

Services.layout: Bento Grid. Mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 cells.

Process.style: Sticky scroll or Horizontal scroll. Steps should feel like chapters in a movie.

Pricing.style: Clean, comparison table or 3-card layout. Highlight 'Agency Partner' tier.
Pricing.cards: Dark cards with white borders. 'Most Popular' gets a subtle glow.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text.
DO NOT use standard 'Inter' font. Use 'Syne' for all headings.
Ensure all images have a subtle 'noise' overlay or filter to match the dark aesthetic.
Use 'gap-24' or 'gap-32' between sections. Do not crowd the design.
All interactive elements must have a hover state.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a premium agency site. Ignore standard templates. Be bold with size and spacing. Use the provided image URLs. Implement the 'Syne' font for all headings immediately. Start by setting up the global dark theme in index.css.
